entry.title: Sugar Tubes - White Sugar - 3.5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: RedPath
Type: BAKING
Price: 13.99

Sugar Tubes - White Sugar - 3.5 Kg / 7.7 Lbs

Sugar adds texture and flavor with this portion control sugar packets to virtually any cooked entree, dipping sauce, or glaze. Not only is it a necessity for your kitchen, but this sugar is a widely used, age-old favorite that's guaranteed to make your dining experience sweeter for guests of all ages.

Extra Fine

Also known as table sugar or white sugar, these extra fine sugar crystals are ideal for all purposes, from table use to cooking, and from preserving homemade jams to sweetening beverages. Its extra fine consistency is perfect for sprinkling atop the rim of margaritas and bar cocktails.

Versatility

Whether baking delightful fruit pies or blending creamy milkshakes, sugary treats add profitable items to your menu that are hard to resist! Offer sugar on your tabletop, allowing guests to apply just the right amount to their hot drinks as it quickly dissolves to sweeten coffee or tea.

entry.title: Splenda - No Calorie Sweetener Packet - 2000 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Splenda
Type: BAKING
Price: 46.99

Splenda - No Calorie Sweetener Packets - 2000 / Case

Sweeten your hot beverages, drink mixes, cereal, and fresh fruit with this Splenda no calorie sweetener packet!

With these convenient packets, there's no need to worry about filling and refilling your sugar pourers with fresh sugar throughout the day. Simply leave them at coffee stations or on tables and your guests can use them as needed. Additionally, since Splenda sugar substitute holds up to heat, it is perfect for sweetening hot coffee and tea, as well as cooking and baking recipes.

Calorie-Free Alternative

Each Splenda packet provides a no calorie alternative to sugar, without losing the taste. Also known as sucralose, Splenda is made through a patented process that converts standard sugar to a no-calorie, non-carbohydrate sweetener. Use it any time you want to take small steps towards eating and living healthier.

Individually Wrapped

This 1 gram Splenda packet is individually wrapped for convenient portion control, allowing your guests to measure their desired amount quickly and easily

Versatile Use

Offer them on your tabletop in a caddy or provide them for your patrons to grab on-the-go at your hotel breakfast bar, self-service restaurant, party, or catered event!

entry.title: Vitrex - 6030 Sugar Packet Holder - 6 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vitrex
Type: BAKING
Price: 10.99

Vitrex - 6030 Sugar Portion Holder - 6 / Pack

The eggshell-colored sugar packet holder is a nice addition to the tabletop. The white of this china is bright and looks sharp as part of any tabletop presentation. It gives a great contrast to colored table linens and the neutral color complements any decor. The compact design of this holder is unobtrusive yet has plenty of room for sugar and sweetener packets. This sturdy and simple solution looks even better when paired up with other coffee and tea-serving accessories. Place one upon each table to create a cohesive and aesthetically appealing look that ensures your patrons can properly sweeten their favorite drinks.

This sugar packet holder prevents moisture absorption. This durable piece stands up against breakage, chipping, and scratches commonly caused by the wear and tear of everyday use.

entry.title: Sweet'N Low - Pink Sweetener Zero Calorie 28910 - 1000 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sweet'N Low
Type: BAKING
Price: 14.99

Sweet'N Low - 28910 Pink Zero Calorie Sweetener - 1000 / Pack

Sweeten your coffees and teas while cutting down on calories with this Sweet'N Low 1 gram packet.

With its recognized brand name and familiar pink-colored packets, this Sweet'N Low sweetener is perfect for table service at your restaurant or coffee shop. With these convenient packets, there's no need to worry about filling and refilling your sugar pourers with fresh sugar throughout the day. Simply leave them at coffee stations or on tables and your guests can use them as needed. They're also great for parties or catered events so your guests can sweeten their hot beverages as they please.

Calorie and Cost-Conscious Alternative

This saccharin sweetener has a pleasant taste with fewer calories, no carbohydrates, and no fat. In fact, Sweet'N Low has less than 1/4 of the calories that regular sugar has. Plus, each 1 gram pink packet sweetens like 2 teaspoons of sugar, making it a great substitute to save on sugar costs.

Individually Wrapped

This 1 gram Sweet'N Low sweetener packet is individually wrapped for convenient portion control, allowing your guests to measure their desired amount quickly and easily.

Versatile Use

Offer them on your tabletop in a caddy or provide them for your patrons to grab on-the-go at your hotel breakfast bar, self-service restaurant, party, or catered event!

entry.title: PC Wing's - Brown Sugar Portions - 1000 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: PC Wing's
Type: BAKING
Price: 27.49

Wing's - 2061 Brown Sugar Packets - 1000 / Case

Satisfy the sweet tooth of every guest with this brown sugar!  Brown sugar is great for use as a sweetener in baked items, as well as increases moisture retention. Use this high quality brown sugar to make muffins, coffee cakes, and irresistibly rich chocolate chip cookies in your bakery, diner, or cafe! It's also a sweet addition to baked beans or sweet potatoes. Use it in syrups, glazes, or sauces, or play up its crumbly nature by using it as a topping for oatmeal, yogurt, fruit, and cobblers.

This gives the sugar its milder flavor with a subtle caramel undertone. From cooking to baking, for to go , catering events, to sprinkling atop pancakes or your warm apple pie, this brown sugar is sure to be an asset in your commercial kitchen!

entry.title: PC Wing's - Black Pepper Portions - 1000 Pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: PC Wing's
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.99

Pc - Black Pepper Portions - 1000 Pcs

Perfectly portioned, these black pepper packets will deliver just the right amount of aromatic flavor to your customers' food. These packets are ideal for any restaurant, diner, convenience store, cafeteria, or take-out station and offer a quick and easy way to complement profitable menu items. Useful for on-the-go orders, these pepper packets provide sanitary packaging and an ideal portion size for improved customer satisfaction.

Each portion control packet is perfect for enhancing a variety of items with a touch of bold, aromatic flavor. Spice up French fries, sandwiches, hamburgers, salads and more with this classic black pepper! Whisk the perfect portion of ground pepper into savory soups, dressings and dips for improved taste. These portion control pepper packets make for a convenient, low-cost addition to your menu.
